name: Tripoly
description:
Jam game for LD37 made in 72 hours.

Hey You!

The web build has been stripped of some graphical effects, will lag in large engagements, and has a resolution a little too small for comfortable play. I you are genuinely interested in the game and not looking to do a quick rating, I highly encourage you to download the standalone version for a smooth experience.


Post-jam adjustments:

Loudness reduction

Adjusted graphics settings for web build
